summary: Instantly move [i]any[/i] items from your pack into [i]any[/i] container. Easily Move, Rename, or Unlock any container... even from other mods! Stow your gear or open a chest in your home from anywhere else. Craft your own containers to add permanent new storage to any location.
descriptionHtml:
Instantly move [i]any[/i] items from your pack into [i]any[/i] container. Easily Move, Rename, or Unlock any container... even from other mods! Stow your gear or open a chest in your home from anywhere else. Craft your own containers to add permanent new storage to any location. 

THIS IS THE DAWNGUARD SUPPORT PATCH v1.0
This mod improves targeting and adds Dawnguard items to the presets used by my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28196]Arod\'s Better Containers[/url] mod. 

You must subscribe to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28196]Arod\'s Better Containers[/url] and have Dawnguard installed for this mod to function.

Arod\'s Storage Solutions will forever improve your Skyrim experience. It works on any chest, barrel, pouch, sack or other container, and with any item you can put in your backpack, even if they came from third party mods. Supports Dragonborn, Dawnguard, and Hearthfire DLCs as well.
author: Arod Snaux
